com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath

Class OathService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemalto.idp.mobile.otp.oath.OathService

  • public class OathService
extends java.lang.Object
    OathService is the entry-point for Oath features.
    Since:
    4.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Create OathService.

      Returns Factory for creating OATH settings and OATH devices.

      • create

        public static OathService create(OtpModule module)
        Create OathService. IdpCore needs to be configured and OtpModule needs to be created before creating OathService.

        Returns:
        oathService
